content: i hope you enjoy this pattern of duo the owl from duolingo it was fun to design my eldest boy is learning 13 yes thirteen languages on duolingo so i designed this for him you may need to adjust hook size depending on how tightly you crochet - it needs to be tight enough so that the fibrefill stuffing doesn t show through this pattern will work with any yarn weight as long as an appropriate sized hook is used you re more than welcome to use this pattern for personal use but please don t use for commercial use this is my first published pattern if you have any requests please send me a message and i ll see what i can do
